January 3, 1957
Mr# Teen Hall, Jr.
Assistant to the Director
of Public Relations
Wofford College
Sparta&burg, South Carolina
Dear Mr. Hall:
Reference is made to your letter and enclosures of November 15 to Dr. Skomia.
For some reason receipt of that correspondence was never acknowledge^ and for
this oversight please accept our apologies.
We did read everything yew sent a:*i included some information on your progress
in the December NAEB Newsletter. I found the scripts most interesting, and I
assume your audience has expressed a similar opinion.
Naturally, we are interested in everything all of our members do, so we thank
you for this information and look forward to receiving further evidence of
the good job Wofford College and station WSPA-TV are doing to improve the viewÂ¬
ing of the television audience.
Best wishes for a happy New Year.
Sincerely,
REU:ap
Robert E, Underwood, Jr,
Network Manager
